info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 7:45PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Cochise County through 830 PM MST... At 744 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tombstone, or 18 miles northeast of Sierra Vista, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tombstone. This includes the following highways... Route 80 between mile markers 312 and 322. Route 82 between mile markers 64 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
